reviewText: This video shows the easy things that one can do to control a game regardless of your skill level.  Once you can implement the pointers given in the video (I suggest you prepare hand-written notes to keep in your tennis bag), each point in a game becomes very predictable (hence very easy to play).  You will understand why you win or why you should lose.  The info looks simple (and common sense) but a lot of players just do otherwise.  I have watched this video over 6 times as my skill level improves (now I am a 4.0)
